Ikenberry Commons.name: Ikenberry Commons
Ikenberry Commons.description: You are at the north entry of the Ikenberry Commons, near Wassaja Hall. Your friend from Wassaja Hall is missing! You need to find him!

dining hall key.name: Dining Hall Key
dining hall key.description: You pick up a silver key used to unlock the Ikenberry Dining Hall.

The Ike.name: The Ike
The Ike.description: You are at the Ike, a hub for all Ikenberry activities.

uiuc face mask.name: UIUC Face Mask
uiuc face mask.description: You pick up a UIUC-styled face mask. This was the trend just a few months agoâ€“who knows how much it will sell for now...

package station key.name: Package Station Key
package station key.description: You pick up a golden key that has "SDRP" inscribed on it. Could this open the Ikenberry Package Station?

Package Station.name: Package Station
Package Station.description: You are at the Ikenberry Package Station. There's packages all over the place. Some might be valuable...

hand sanitizer.name: Hand Sanitizer
hand sanitizer.description: You pick up a bottle of Hand Sanitizer. This was quite the commodity back during the pandemic. You could get quite a bit of money out of this.

toilet paper.name: Toilet Paper
toilet paper.description: You pick up a pack of Charmin Toilet Paper. Perhaps more valuable than the Hand Sanitizer, this could make you a lot of money.

Ikenberry Dining Hall.name: Ikenberry Dining Hall
Ikenberry Dining Hall.description: You are at the south entry of the Ike Dining Hall. The room's a mess and there's a rotten smell coming from the kitchen.

vending machine key.name: Vending Machine Key
vending machine key.description: You pick up a rusty key used to unlock the entrance to the Ikenberry Vending Machine, a notorious store known to rip students off. This may help you get to Wassaja.

moldy candy bar.name: Moldy Candy Bar
moldy candy bar.description: You pick up a moldy candy bar that expired a month ago. This will sell for a fortune at the Vending Machine.

Vending Machine.name: Vending Machine
Vending Machine.description: You find yourself at vending machine that allows you to sell items for cash. Try the "sell" and "valueof" command.

blood-stained wassaja icard.name: Blood-Stained Wassaja iCard
blood-stained wassaja icard.description: WHAT! It's your best friend's iCard with blood stains. He's from Wassaja Hall. You need to save him!
